targets.rawSql:
SELECT *, date_sub(start_time, interval +8 hour) TT 
FROM alert_db.alert_table as A
left join
(SELECT english, property_code  FROM alert_db.map_table ) as M
on M.property_code = A.code
WHERE incidentID = "${ID}"

confirmModal.body: Please confirm to update changed values
confirmModal.title: Confirm update request

targets.rawSql:
SELECT * FROM alert_db.progress_table
WHERE incidentID = "${ID}" 
AND stage = 1

SELECT pdf FROM alert_db.SOP
WHERE sop_id = (SELECT SOP FROM alert_db.alert_table 
WHERE incidentID = "${ID}")
